1:
--------------------
Text: Tartaglia (commedia dell'arte):  He is farsighted and with a minor stutter (hence his name; cf. Spanish tartamudear), he is usually classed as one of the group of old characters (vecchio) who appears in many scenarios as one of the lovers (innamorati).
Triplets:<Tartaglia
2:
--------------------
<Text: Tartaglia (commedia dell'arte):  His social status varies; he is sometimes a bailiff, lawyer, notary or chemist.>
Triplets:<Tartaglia
3:
--------------------
<Text: Tartaglia (commedia dell'arte):  Dramatist Carlo Gozzi turned him into a statesman, and so he remained thereafter.>
Triplets:<Tartaglia
